content.title: Krshak Prashikshan Tatha Bhraman Karyakram
content.details: The Krishak Parisharam Bhraman Karyakram Yojana under the Horticulture and Food Processing Department of Madhya Pradesh provides tours to different countries and states/divisions/districts/trends outside the development block to attract farmers towards the production of horticulture crops by giving tours regarding horticulture crops.
benefits: Farmer training within the state: ₹1,000/- per farmer per month (maximum 7 days)
Farmer training outside the state: ₹1,500/- per farmer per day
Exposure visit outside the state to observe new technology: ₹1,500/- per farmer per day
Total of ₹12,000/- for 20 trainees in one-day farmer training and tour, maximum expenditure per farmer is ₹500/- and honorarium to the host farmer is ₹100/-
eligibility: This scheme will apply to all sections
Farmers of all classes who cultivate crops
content.application_process: Online. Applicants have to visit the official portal, click on 'New Registration', enter mobile number and click on OTP Send, authenticate via OTP, fill out the required details, upload the documents, and click on the submit button.

faqs.question: What is this scheme about?
faqs.answer: Under the Scheme, farmers are made aware of new technologies of agronomy by giving them tours to countries outside the district and states.

faqs.question: What benefits are provided?
faqs.answer: Financial and educational benefits are provided under the scheme.

faqs.question: What financial benefits are provided?
faqs.answer: Farmer training within the state: ₹1,000/- per farmer per month (maximum 7 days), Farmer training outside the state: ₹1,500/- per farmer per day, Exposure visit outside the state to observe new technology: ₹1,500/- per farmer per day.

faqs.question: How is education/training provided to the farmers?
faqs.answer: The Krishak Parisharam Bhraman Karyakram Yojana organizes tours for farmers to other regions to showcase successful practices from other areas.

faqs.question: Who can get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: This scheme will apply to all sections and all categories of farmers who cultivate crops.

faqs.question: How to get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicants have to visit the official portal, click on 'New Registration', enter mobile number and click on OTP Send, authenticate via OTP, fill out the required details, upload the documents, and click on the submit button.

faqs.question: What documents are required?
faqs.answer: Photo, Aadhaar Card, Khasra Number/B1/Copy of Forest Patta, Bank Passbook, Birth Certificate.
